FuncDef: The display bgp remote prefix-sid command displays the mappings between remote prefix SIDs, End.M locator routes, and local VPN instances.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the egress fails in an SRv6 TE Policy scenario, the same VPN SID can be deployed to provide egress protection. You can run this command to check information about forwarding entries in an egress protection scenario.
